Sentencas: Application of wavelet networks for identification of a direct internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell (DIR-SOFC) stack is reported in this paper.
Titulo: Nonlinear identification of a DIR-SOFC stack using wavelet networks

Sentencas: The SOFC is a complex system particularly when it is directly fueled with hydrocarbons (natural gas, coal gas, etc.).
Titulo: Nonlinear identification of a DIR-SOFC stack using wavelet networks

Sentencas: Most of the traditional models of the SOFC, based on the reforming, electrochemical and thermal modeling, are too complicated.
Titulo: Nonlinear identification of a DIR-SOFC stack using wavelet networks

Sentencas: To facilitate controller design and analysis of systems, the wavelet network dynamic model of the DIR-SOFC is constructed, avoiding the consideration of the complex processes in the fuel cells.
Titulo: Nonlinear identification of a DIR-SOFC stack using wavelet networks

Sentencas: The input and output data are used for initializing and training the wavelet network by a recursive approach.
Titulo: Nonlinear identification of a DIR-SOFC stack using wavelet networks

Sentencas: The Gram-Schmidt algorithm, the Cross-Validation method and immune selection principles are applied to optimization of the network.
Titulo: Nonlinear identification of a DIR-SOFC stack using wavelet networks

Sentencas: The simulation is performed and comparisons of characteristics under different operating conditions are given.
Titulo: Nonlinear identification of a DIR-SOFC stack using wavelet networks

Sentencas: The results show high static and dynamic accuracy of the identified model.
Titulo: Nonlinear identification of a DIR-SOFC stack using wavelet networks

Sentencas: Further, the obtained wavelet network model can be used for developing the model-based controllers of DIR-SOFC.
Titulo: Nonlinear identification of a DIR-SOFC stack using wavelet networks
